text: If War Comes Tomorrow () is a 1938Вышел документальный фильм о работе фронтовых операторов в первые дни войны Soviet drama movie directed by Lazar Antsi-Polovsky, Georgy Beryozko and Yefim Dzigan.Если завтра война It stars Inna Fyodorova, Vsevolod Sanayev, and Serafim Kozminsky. == Actors == * Inna Fyodorova as commander's wife * Vsevolod Sanayev as soldier * Serafim Kozminsky as air brigade commander == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1938 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: If War Comes Tomorrow
